title: Why do some rap artists wait until releasing an album, even if they are done with it? - Quora

response.answer_text: This is not a rap thing, it’s much the same thing as releasing a big Hollywood movie. If you release in an off time, you don’t have much competition, and it will be easy to become #1. If you release at the big volume times, like Christmas, you will be competing against the really big blockbusters, but you will make a lot more volume in sales. It’s not an artistic decision, but one made by the producers and bean-counters.
